'''1.20.11.0''' is the second beta version of [[Minecraft Education 1.20.12]], released to ChromeOS and Android exclusively on July 27, 2023,<ref>{{cite|url=http://web.archive.org/web/20230728062909/https://educommunity.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/4407483028116-Download-Minecraft-Education-Beta|title=Download Minecraft Education Beta|website=Minecraft Education Support|quote=The current version of the Beta is 1.20.11}}</ref> which fixes some bugs.
